title: Mini-Ep 224: How Can I Remember My Friend's Birthday?
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 224: How Can I Remember My Friend's Birthday?
itunes:subtitle: Kate enjoys the soothing voice and enlightening words of Robin Wall Kimmerer and Doree puts her self-motivation to work. Then, they hear from listeners about deciding whether or not to go to a high school reunion, how to handle the emotions around fami...
description:
Kate enjoys the soothing voice and enlightening words of Robin Wall Kimmerer and Doree puts her self-motivation to work. Then, they hear from listeners about deciding whether or not to go to a high school reunion, how to handle the emotions around family estrangements, and what to do when you’ve forgotten your friend’s birthday.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
